CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 21, 1951, pg. 28 reads: "Kotton Kaper - A "Kotton Kaper" was held last Wednesday at the Penn-Shady Ballroom by the Social-ites Club, a group of young maids and matrons. Left to right, first row: Betty Ann Robinson, Mrs. Roland Sawyer, sponsor, and Jeanne Stanton, president.  Second row: Peggy Brown, Mary Atkins, Eleanor Johnson, Betty Mae Butler, Ann Allen, Jean Burrell and Romaine Childs.  Third row: Jean Bowers, Yvonne Lewis and Audrey Moore. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of thirteen members of the Social-ites Club, left to right, first row: Betty Ann Robinson, Mrs. Roland Sawyer, and Jeanne Stanton; second row: Peggy Brown, Mary Atkins, Eleanor Johnson, Betty Mae Butler, Ann Allen, Jean Burrell, and Romaine Childs; third row: Jean Bowers, Yvonne Lewis, and Audrey Moore, some wearing cotton ball corsages, for "Kotton Kaper" in Penn Shady Ballroom, another version
